channel.title: How do i make a player a donator?
channel.description:
someone please tell me how to make a player a donator.here is ther charactor file. code thing. [code][ACCOUNT] character-username = Baller character-password = 22b45d2586276cee610e15a9be7c2218
[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3087 character-posy = 3489 character-rights = 0 character-lastconnection = ppp-70-129-129-202.dsl.rcsntx.swbell.net character-special = 100 character-tz = -1 character-starter = 1 character-pouch1 = 0 character-pouch2 = 0 character-pouch3 = 0 character-pouch4 = 0 character-energy = 95 character-taskID = -1 character-taskAmount = -1 character-jad = 0 character-q1 = 15 character-q2 = 15 character-q3 = 15 character-q4 = 15 character-q5 = 15 character-q6 = 15 character-q7 = 15 character-q8 = 15 character-q9 = 15 character-q10 = 15 character-q11 = 15 character-Ahrim = 0 character-Verac = 0 character-Dharok =0 character-Torag = 0 character-Karils =0 character-Guthan =0 character-Barrows 0 character-brightness = 0 character-fighttype = 1 character-skill = 0 character-chat = 0 character-ancients = 0 character-pin = 0 character-saradomin = 0 character-retaliate = 0 character-action = 0 character-pcpoints = 0 character-assault = 0 character-donator = 0 character-bow = 100 character-shield = 100 character-startr = 2

item.title: How do i make a player a donator?
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

The error would be a nice thing to put here.

But my guess would be is you do not have the same base as him, or you do not have a donator integer like he does. You would need to add that, then add saving and loading in for the value as well.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a player a donator?

it wont let me put it in. that or im not puting it in right. on my compiler it does the problem thing ya know.

item.source: How do i make a player a donator?

item.title: How do i make a player a donator?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“givedonator”) && playerRights >= 2) {
String name = command.substring(12);

try {
	int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
	client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

	c.donator = 1;
	c.disconnected = true;
	} catch (Exception e) {
		sM(name + " probably isn't online atm, or doesn't exist xD");
	}
}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a player a donator?
